name: Gallium Ventures
slogan: Helping global companies with strategy led creative PR, marketing and product development
description:
Gallium Ventures is an award winning strategic communications consultancy which works across early stage startups to large listed companies globally. We work with VC's supporting their portfolio and founders looking to drive strategic growth whether the end goal is sales, downloads, crowdfunding, or an exit. 

Our honest approach means we work comprehensively with clients in order to help help build a foundation for a successful company. It is our belief a consultancy with experience across borders and an eye on our clients larger goals mean we are able to craft the right long-term strategies which deliver results. 

We have trusted experience in everything from product development and packaging design all the way to PR and marketing. Our communications consultancy is built on expertise across industries and some of the best talent globally - from Hong Kong to San Francisco. 

It is our impressive reputation and quality of service that has had founders approaching us for help.

team.title: & Managing Director
team.name: Heather Delaney
team.bioHtml: Founder and Managing Director helping companies launch beautifully designed #hardware and #software globally and exit. World's leading expert in crowdfunding.

jobs.title: Account Executive / Senior Account Executive
jobs.description:
We’re looking for an Account Executive / Senior Account Executive to join our exciting award winning tech and consumer PR agency in London.

At Gallium we believe it's important our team enjoy who they work with, and what they work on. Because of this career progression is based on merit (not waiting for a job roll to become available), and the members of our team hold a central role in deciding what companies and products we work with, along with the direction of the culture. 

Culture:
Agencies don't come much better than this as this boutique agency give any new member of the team an opportunity to grow with the company. Working with startups and well known brands around the world mean you will a unique perspective as you work under a and a kick-ass MD who will show you the ropes. Everyone have varied backgrounds, so there is a cross-pollination of ideas and training. 

You will be involved in:
Working with the team in creating fun and engaging PR campaigns that drive anything from brand awareness, sales or even social engagement. This is done through creative sessions and supporting the team in strategy and planning for various accounts. You will also be expected to build relationships across consumer, tech and national press. 

Events are common, to travelling to trade shows around the world wouldn't be out of the ordinary 

About you:
To be considered for this role you will ideally have experience within the PR industry already (agency a bonus) working with brands within the technology and/or consumer space. Broader corporate or B2B experience will also be considered.

You’ll already have the knowledge of what it takes to craft a good press release, what makes a good press list, have started to build some great relationships with journalists, and have a track record in securing awesome coverage.
